title: Latin-Funk Band Goes Metal, Covers Black Sabbath
teaser: Into funk-jazz-Latino-soul-psychedelic-metal music? Then check out Brownout's new album Brown Sabbath. NPR's Arun Rath speaks with bandleader Greg Gonzalez about the surprising mix of styles.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
